titles.title: A bill for the relief of Fanie Phily Mateo Angeles.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Judiciary. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Judiciary. Reported to Senate by Senator Biden without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 421.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the Subcommittee on International Law, Immigration, and Refugees.

bill.summary: 1/21/1993--Introduced. Declares a named individual to have been lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
